SELECT f.id AS f_id, f.STATUS AS f_status, f.file_url AS f_fileUrl, f.file_name AS f_fileName, f.created_time AS f_createTime, fg.id AS fg_id, fg.file_group_name AS fg_fileGroupName, fg.created_time AS fg_createTime, fg.STATUS AS fg_status FROM tb_sys_file f LEFT JOIN ( SELECT file_group_id, file_id FROM tb_sys_file_group_file WHERE record_status != 0 ) fgf ON fgf.file_id = f.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tb_sys_file_group WHERE record_status != 0 ) fg ON fgf.file_group_id = fg.id
where 1=1 and f.record_status != 0
and f.file_name=#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and f.record_status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and f.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY f.created_time desc
